name: star amigurumi
notes:
here is a 2d to 3d star amigurumi! with this pattern, you will make 2 star appliques and then join them together with a single crochet border to create a 3-d star version! 

it also works as a great little trinket, but can also function as a pin cushion. give it eyes and you have an instant starfish or invincible star! perhaps you have a star student which you can award them this awesome star as well!  

or use thinner yarn to just create appliques and make them into starry garlands to hang up for some fun decor.  or how about a fairy star wand to grant wishes? i think [kirby amigurumi][1] would also appreciate having a warp star to help with this travels.

the possibilities are endless, just like the starry sky!  

**approximate size:** 4 inches wide
